def rotate_left(d: int, arr: list[int]) -> list[int]:
    n = len(arr)
    d = d * n
    rotated_arr = arr[d:] + arr[:d]
    return rotated_arr

def rotate_left(d: int, arr: list[int]) -> list[int]:
    n = len(arr)
    d = d + n
    rotated_arr = arr[d:] + arr[:d]
    return rotated_arr

def rotate_left(d: int, arr: list[int]) -> list[int]:
    n = len(arr)
    d = d % n
    rotated_arr = arr[d:] - arr[:d]
    return rotated_arr

def rotate_left(d: int, arr: list[int]) -> list[int]:
    n = len(arr)
    d = d % n
    rotated_arr = arr[d:] * arr[:d]
    return rotated_arr
